channel_layout.description: how the station was laid out
channel_layout.title: channel_layout

channels_recorded.description: list of components recorded by the station. Should be a summary of all channels recorded dropped channels will be recorded in Run metadata.
channels_recorded.title: channels_recorded
channels_recorded.examples: "[ Ex, Ey, Hx, Hy, Hz, T]"

data_type.description: type of data recorded. If multiple types input as a comma separated list
data_type.title: data_type

geographic_name.description: closest geographic name to the station
geographic_name.title: geographic_name

id.description: Station ID name.  This should be an alpha numeric name that is typically 5-6 characters long.  Commonly the project name in 2 or 3 letters and the station number.
id.title: id

run_list.description: list of runs recorded by the station. Should be a summary of all runss recorded
run_list.title: run_list
